name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopguide Ai - Amazon Shopping Cart Assistant & GPT copilot

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon shopping Cart Ai descriptions, analysis and comparison chart for faster and smarter buying decisions..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever added more than one Amazon product to the shopping cart to make the final decision later?  Is it hard to decide which product to buy? ShopGuide is your new shopping Assistant. Our AI-powered extension simplifies your shopping experience by:

1. Quick Summaries: of selected items in your shopping cart 
2. Analysis and recommendations by the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI).
3. Comparison chart: to quickly identify differences between similar items.
4. Customer reviews: Compare prices, review/star count and a summary of what customers love and hate each product.  

Make informed purchasing decisions with ShopGuide!

CONFIDENTIALITY:  We do not gather, store nor share any personal private information.
